details: Led the migration of a legacy monolithic architecture to a microservices-based system using Node.js and Docker, improving system uptime by 35%.
Architected and deployed a real-time data processing pipeline using Kafka and Spark, handling over 10 million events daily.
Optimized database performance by implementing advanced indexing strategies and Redis caching, resulting in a 50% reduction in API response times.
Mentored a team of 5 junior and mid-level engineers, conducting regular code reviews and architectural workshops.
Collaborated with product owners and stakeholders to define technical roadmaps and deliver features ahead of project deadlines.
Developed and maintained the core user-facing dashboard using React and Redux, enhancing the user experience for 500k+ active users.
Integrated third-party payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal) and automated invoicing workflows, reducing manual overhead by 20%.
Built and scaled RESTful APIs using Python (Django) and PostgreSQL, ensuring high availability and robust data integrity.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions, reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes.
Enhanced application accessibility (a11y) to meet WCAG 2.1 standards, broadening the reach to a more diverse user base.
Assisted in the development of a data visualization platform using Chart.js and Vue.js, helping clients visualize complex market trends.
Developed automated unit and integration tests using Jest and Cypress, increasing code coverage from 40% to 85%.
Fixed critical bugs and improved the performance of the internal CRM tool, increasing team productivity by 15%.
